content: Personal Accident Permanent Disablement benefit provides sixty thousand dollars for Basic plan, seventy thousand dollars for Enhanced plan, eighty thousand dollars for Premier plan, and one hundred thousand dollars for Exclusive plan.
questions: What is the benefit amount for the Basic plan?
How much does the Enhanced plan provide for Permanent Disablement?
What is the maximum coverage offered by the Premier plan?
Which plan offers the highest benefit for Personal Accident Permanent Disablement?
Is the benefit amount the same for all plans?
What is the difference in coverage between the Basic and Enhanced plans?
How much does the Exclusive plan cover for Permanent Disablement?
Are there any other plans available besides the Basic, Enhanced, Premier, and Exclusive plans?
What type of incidents does the Personal Accident Permanent Disablement benefit cover?
Can I upgrade from the Basic plan to the Premier plan for more coverage?
